comment:
>>40008345
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Considered you're still talking, I imagine you're using “literally” figuratively, right?”
> [[ Nel ]]: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
> [[ Nel ]]: OK SURE SORRY I'M FIGURATIVELY DEAD
> [[ Nel ]]: SORRY I OFFENDED YOUR KEEN LITERARY SENSE I AM CURLED UP IN A LITTLE BALL UNDER A TABLE
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Look, just stay calm. Don't be aggressive.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I assure you, if they wanted you to die, you'd be potato-mash in less than a second.
> [[ Nel ]]: ashe wtf that doesn't help at all.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I'm just saying relax, because you're still alive. If you don't provoke them, we can meet back up.

“There's definitely more. Nel's apparently stuck in a room with them.” You say. “I think he might have let them loose somehow, which is why this one is just walking around out here.”

“Wonderful,” Kainzo says. “How many?”

“And I quote, 'like twenty'.” You respond.

“Even better. Does he know what to do?” Kainzo asks.

> Knock the first one down the stairs while you've got the chance.
> Have Nel try and maneuver back to the party.
> Attempt a rescue mission.
> Write-in.
name: BSO
